Package dataStructures.suffixtree

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataStructures.suffixtree.Node
  • class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a node of the generalized suffix tree graph
    See Also:
    GeneralizedSuffixTree

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getData()
        Returns all the indexes associated to this node and its children.
        Returns:
        all the indexes associated to this node and its children

      • getData

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getData​(int numElements)
        Returns the first numElements elements from the ones associated to this node. Gets data from the payload of both this node and its children, the string representation of the path to this node is a substring of the one of the children nodes.
        Parameters:
        numElements - the number of results to return. Use -1 to get all
        Returns:
        the first numElements associated to this node and children

      • addRef

        void addRef​(int index)
        Adds the given index to the set of indexes associated with this

      • computeAndCacheCount

        protected int computeAndCacheCount()
        Computes the number of results that are stored on this node and on its children, and caches the result. Performs the same operation on subnodes as well
        Returns:
        the number of results

      • getResultCount

        public int getResultCount()
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns the number of results that are stored on this node and on its children. Should be called after having called computeAndCacheCount.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when this method is called without having called computeAndCacheCount first
        See Also:
        computeAndCacheCount()
